posts.post_title: F/S T3 McIntyre Tough Brooklyn Var. SOLD THANKS
posts.post_content:
For Sale: T3 Turkey Red Harry McIntyre SGC 50 Checklist back.
Lew Lipset's book lists this card as a tougher version having only Brooklyn on the front instead of the two team version.

Sold thanks

Payment by Money Order or check only please.

Please private message me if interested.  
Thanks,
Tim Kindler
